# www.omelet.com llms.txt

> Omelet is an independent creative agency in Los Angeles that helps brands thrive through integrated campaigns, brand strategy, and original content.

## Work
[Work](https://www.omelet.com/?work)

- [Monopoly GO! | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/monopolygo): Friendship Pays
- [Google AI Pro | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/google-ai-pro): Google AI Pro
- [YouTube Premium | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/youtube-premium): All YouTube. No Interruptions.
- [Google Small Business | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/google-small-business): Heroes of Small Business
- [Guardian | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/guardian): Everyone Deserves a Guardian
- [Netflix | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/netflix): Extraction 2 Stunts
- [Asana | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/asana): Make work work for you
- [Hogwarts Legacy | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/hogwarts-legacy): Live the Unwritten
- [Walmart | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/walmart): Shared Values Storytelling
- [Google Play | Omelet | Los Angeles Ad Agency](https://omelet.com/google-play): Diablo Immortal
